title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.9 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5905.9 - Reporting

State Regulations

Qualified firms shall submit interim and final progress and
financial reports to the foundation as further described in this
section. (a) Progress reports shall
include information on the progress of completed State-supported research in
accomplishing the technical objectives stated in the firm's original State
research award contract proposal. (b) Financial reports shall be delivered in a
form specified by the foundation, and include information on current period
expenditures and cumulative expenditures, as compared to total anticipated
expenditures stated in the firm's original State research award contract
proposal. (c) The foundation shall
protect against the disclosure of proprietary information to the same extent
provided for in a qualified firm's Federal Phase I agreement with a Federal
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

5905.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
